SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.workflow.api

Class WorkflowStateListener

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowStateListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkflowListener
public class WorkflowStateListener extends Object implements WorkflowListener
A simple workflow listener implementation suitable for monitoring a workflow's state changes.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    The states that this listener respond to with a notify()

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WorkflowStateListener()
    Constructs a workflow listener that notifies for any state change to any workflow instance.
    WorkflowStateListener(Long workflowInstanceId)
    Constructs a workflow listener that notifies for any state change to a single workflow instance.
    WorkflowStateListener(Long workflowInstanceId, WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState... states)
    Constructs a workflow listener for a single workflow instance.

    Constructs a workflow listener for a set of workflow instances.
    WorkflowStateListener(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState state)
    Constructs a workflow listener for all workflow instances.
    WorkflowStateListener(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState... states)
    Constructs a workflow listener for all workflow instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener()
      Constructs a workflow listener that notifies for any state change to any workflow instance.

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener(Long workflowInstanceId)
      Constructs a workflow listener that notifies for any state change to a single workflow instance.
      Parameters:
      workflowInstanceId - the workflow identifier

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener(Long workflowInstanceId, WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState... states)
      Constructs a workflow listener for a single workflow instance. The listener may be configured to be notified on state changes.
      Parameters:
      workflowInstanceId - the workflow identifier
      states - the workflow state changes that should trigger this listener. If null, any state change will trigger the listener.

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState... states)
      Constructs a workflow listener for all workflow instances. The listener may be configured to be notified on a set of specific state changes.
      Parameters:
      states - the workflow state changes that should trigger this listener. If null, any state change will trigger the listener.

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener(WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState state)
      Constructs a workflow listener for all workflow instances. The listener may be configured to be notified on a of specific state changes.
      Parameters:
      state - the workflow state change that should trigger this listener. If null, any state change will trigger the listener.

    • WorkflowStateListener

      public WorkflowStateListener(Set<Long> workflowInstanceIds, WorkflowInstance.WorkflowState... states)
      Constructs a workflow listener for a set of workflow instances. The listener may be configured to be notified on a set of specific state changes.
      Parameters:
      workflowInstanceIds - the workflow identifiers
      states - the workflow state changes that should trigger this listener. If null, any state change will trigger the listener.
